column3: PURPOSE (Should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)

for quick maths.
for muh pretty docs.

sets the wallpaper.

a tidier vim with some useful features.
is an extensible music server written in Python.

is a terminal interface for mpd that works well with mopidy.
is the patrician's choice video player.
lets you read man pages of programs.
a ncurses interface for music with multiple formats and a powerful tag editor.
is a terminal RSS client.
